name: Cafe de la Soul
description:
Cafe de la Soul

Welcome to Hangar No. 7 Cafe. The year is 23XX and we've got no time to lose. Folks are coming in hungry and we've got just what they need: Red velvet cake, Blue Silk Pie, and more food for the soul to remind you life is worth living. Gotta get 'em their food as fast as you can, but that don't mean you can slack on keeping things proper. Do a good job and good word will spread. Fall short and the Hangar No. 7 Cafe will be yesterday's spot. Good luck and get cookin'

Controls

Gameplay

Watch for customers queuing up orders on the service lanes

Match the color lane with the requested color to infuse the food with vibes and energy before it reaches the customer.

When a service lane gets dirty, use your cybernetic arm to make quick work of cleanup
